Prototypes

This page will provide an overview of the design of the prototypes that will start with the initial prototype and the reasons behind the design changes that lead to the next prototype.

Protoype One

The first protoype is the initial attempt at building the designed drone. However, there were weaknesses in the design that led to failure.

The main issues are listed below:

  1. Too heavy

  2. Small Propellers/Less Thrust

  3. Conductive Carbon Fiber Frame

  4. Poor Solder Connections
